author: {'steamid': '76561198347140166', 'num_games_owned': 117, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 722, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 632, 'last_played': 1584110078}
review:
十分推荐这款游戏！
五元购买，横版战斗与解谜并存，收获至少十个小时的快乐！

给我印象最深的优点，就是游戏的剧情对话中有一些讨论和探讨很发人深省，并且游戏在很多小地方都做的特别细节 [spoiler] ，比如：所有角色的面部表情很到位；主角拿着蜡烛的时候，左键会让主角对蜡烛吹气，然后蜡烛就会更亮；很久没有操作之后，主角会睡着，等等。 [/spoiler] 
个人觉得，后期的个别解谜项目缺少一些提示，当时卡了我很久。但这也只是对我个人而言的小问题而已，完全不影响我推荐它！

author: {'steamid': '76561199005998848', 'num_games_owned': 60, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 464, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26, 'last_played': 1680360320}
review:
难道是因为是打折买的吗，为何bug如此之多。。。
最开始的时候电梯人物无互动，看了攻略才知道那个人应该是要主动问我下不下楼的。。。然后退出去想重新开档，主界面所有的字全没有了，对，字全没有了！我根据印象按第四个纽换成英语，这才有字了。但是出来换成classic版本，点进去以后游戏界面就在电脑左上角，没办法拉下来，光标在主界面里也只有一部分范围能移动。。。。
画面挺好的，但这些bug真的迷惑。。。
//
时隔很久我自己解决了，把c盘用户appdata这个游戏的配置文件全部清空，游戏还是很好玩的，希望作者修复一下问题。。。。

author: {'steamid': '76561198413502866', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 451, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 427, 'last_played': 1583489387}
review:
有趣的休闲游戏，主角是个善良？的乌姆，有些对话选项比较腹黑，可可爱爱，画风很简洁。
剧情单线简单，关卡设计比较巧妙，全收藏还是需要一点点耐心，波波城的地图有点令人迷惑。会客厅那个谜题比较有难度，一会儿开灯一会儿关灯。
总的来说很有意思的小游戏，而且打折才5块啊，绝对物超所值！给这个乌姆找个家吧。

author: {'steamid': '76561198433229298', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 90, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1584880866}
review:
乌姆是一款被埋没的平台类游戏神作~ 
这款游戏真的很好玩，画风非常非常的可爱，人物幽默的对话、极佳的战斗手感、奇特的解密都是亮点，仔细观察你会发现游戏中的细节例如刮风 下雨 打雷。 还有时间也是分早中晚的
 不足之处,感觉正式版比试玩版优化更差、中文翻译不全、试玩版并没有发现这个问题、还有一个bug游戏中点击人物对话选项有时候鼠标点击完之后没反应，希望开发商能尽快修复

author: {'steamid': '76561198174501773', 'num_games_owned': 74, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 1070, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 967, 'last_played': 1583420983}

author: {'steamid': '76561198994656196', 'num_games_owned': 431, 'num_reviews': 124, 'playtime_forever': 2260, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 871, 'last_played': 1594914207}
review:
[b]这个打折 5块钱 的价格埋没了这个作品。[/b]

[h1]+[/h1]

1.这个作品是有完整世界观的，而且剧情也不错，故事挺完整的。（稍微有点逗）
很多事是通过玩家收集“幻灯片”告诉玩家的，而且一定程度上影响游戏难度。
[spoiler]点名红绿灯 [/spoiler]
这个设计增加了玩家的沉浸式体验。

2.战斗系统的拿捏很有意思，总体难度可以自己选择，
而且整个难度梯度比较舒缓，但难的boss（主线不要求）也有点硬核。
[spoiler]点名 南瓜（碰一下直接gg玩锤子。。不过玩过undertale的打这个问题不大） [/spoiler]


3.很多小游戏。

4.要素过多，车站要排队，游乐园项目要花钱，火车上的程序员，工作室自己玩自己......

5.这个作品有临时购买系统，主线要求的道具发现没有，可以就地购买，这个系统在这类作品里实在不多见。

[h1]-[/h1]

1.汉化问题。。。。虽然突然冒出来英语我也能看懂，但影响游戏体验啊。
（听说换老版本有全汉化，我怕少内容就没改）

2.跑图累人。虽然最后给了类似中转站的东西，但定点也就那几个。
建议提供存档点（水壶）间传送，或者设计个非战斗场景提高移动速度的道具。

3.几个小问题
[list]
    [*]画风。。。这个看个人喜好，不过这个卡通画风一定程度上影响了玩家对画面碰撞箱的观察（例如跳平台）。
    [*]后期那个解谜谜题有点头大（虽然看攻略可知开发者已经降低难度了）。
    [*]中后期剧情引导有点不够。（乱逛了好一阵子不知道该干啥）
    [*]乱跑的NPC有穿墙bug。。。。（不影响游戏进程）
[/list]

[h1]附：[/h1]
能看出来这个游戏没做完，游戏中有些看起来很有用的东西最后发现用不上。
[spoiler] 电击武器（暂时没强化），可强化的水桶，别的物种的皮肤，鼠标右键吹口哨，海的尽头（强制突然去世）......[/spoiler]


总的来说挺休闲的（没有死亡惩罚机制），游戏做的挺不错，
不过这评价数量。。。。
而且5块便宜的有点离谱。。。。。

有点奇怪（挠头）

review:
设计感超级符合我的口味， 虽然有一些地方没有翻译非常可惜。
但一款有着自己世界观的游戏总是能吸引着我。总的说我太爱这个游戏了。
自己独特的音乐设计，boss战的高昂音乐或是解谜的阴森氛围，都能让我给这款游戏打上十分。
虽然到最后我也没吃到那一口冰淇淋。却拯救了世界：3

author: {'steamid': '76561198984619049', 'num_games_owned': 63, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 932, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 664, 'last_played': 1700667572}
review:
首先，这个折扣，也太便宜了。
在家里上网课，闲的没事找游戏玩，结果忽然发现之前看谜叔玩过的小游戏打折了。
（好多地方都忘了，甚至去找实况看了看。）
没有找完全部的ppt，因为我菜，简单还打了十一个小时（在游乐场以及各种地方消磨时间）
可玩性相当大，支线很多，还有很多道具可以解锁，在于你自己愿不愿意去玩。
其实故事很感人啦！就是一个肥宅家里蹲出去拯救世界（不感人吗！）
很喜欢一些角色的设定，等上水课的时候继续二周目！
以及，有些地方的中夹英还是有点怪怪的，虽然读得懂，但还是有点影响体验。
最后！wuppo真是太可爱了！！！！

review:
画风超可爱！音乐也萌萌的！！！

然而万万没想到
我在这么个看似儿童向的游戏里
进一步的认识到自己是个手残
跳树叶和藤蔓那里太难跳了…
忍不住发出了不亚于玩掘地求生时的怒吼……

没事，玩游戏，最重要的是开心。

author: {'steamid': '76561199021020996', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 459, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 157, 'last_played': 1609941164}
review:

----------

终于知道问题所在了，我竟然不知道这个游戏可以二段跳。

review: 实在是太棒了，画风非常可爱。刚开始玩的时候除了对话比较有意思，玩起来还是有点一头雾水，但是回到乌姆之家之后就开始感觉到游戏的乐趣了。里面的可探索度特别高，还有隐藏的支线，完全可以玩二周目。最后通关之后还会把世界之后变成什么样，里面的人物之后的生活一一说清楚，整个游戏都是一个温馨可爱的世界。期待下一部作品。

author: {'steamid': '76561198127826233', 'num_games_owned': 72, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 597, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1611128465}
review:
2020.3.21更新：

WUPPO虽然主线通关很快，但是具体可玩性非常高！！而且游戏里有很多细节做得很精致，让你感叹小小一隅的wuppo世界有多精彩~ 作者的世界观塑造也有一些令人思考的人生意义，太佩服了。
顺带一提，穿戴道具的时候多按按左键！有些道具左键有功能的！
可惜游戏成就太少，不然会有更多玩家愿意发掘彩蛋的吧~~~

-------刚买游戏的兴奋↓-----------

第一次坐train，突然有种来自深渊abyss的感觉，太爽了！！！
第一次在游戏里排队乘过山车……太真实了……
以及我也想问为什么对话框选项这么慢哈哈哈（更新：连按两下esc可以解决）
5块钱太香了太香了！！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198342803773', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 1158, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 277, 'last_played': 1584163310}
review:
写的第一篇测评，这游戏很早就关注了，这次打折力度非常大，所以就直接下手了
这个小生物非常可爱，而且剧情也有点逗，可以自由探索，还有乐园可以去游玩，去帮助其他小精灵完成主线任务，赚取信用点稍微有点肝，报纸发到手酸，也有打boss的，就是跳着打啊打
还能二人同屏打，总体来说喜欢画风可爱，不太手残的人也能打，最好是用手柄，流程应该不太长，真对得起这个价格了，唯一的缺点是有些中文根本就没翻译好，好多话里有中文又有英文。

author: {'steamid': '76561198854874867', 'num_games_owned': 93, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 384, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 292, 'last_played': 1653827974}
review:
非常nice的游戏，和传统闯关游戏相比，巫波的剧情很丰富，有大量的支线任务和隐藏故事可以解锁，其中有解谜要素，有战斗系统，也有类似于经营类的玩法，巫波完全可以满足不同类型玩家的需求。
游戏讲述的故事可以说是类似一个童话，也是挺暖心。游戏中的许多事件看似毫无关联，但是串起来就变成了一个十分有趣的长篇童话。游戏有完整的世界观，给人一种恢宏大气的感觉。有完整的世界观，在玩游戏的时候不会感觉游戏里只有你一个生物，不同的NPC都井然有序，如同一个完整的社会。
此外，游戏开发商正在努力进行着汉化工作，目前游戏汉化版本为1.2。关键要素都已经翻译，完全不会英语的朋友也可以安心玩。

author: {'steamid': '76561198324410042', 'num_games_owned': 152, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 464, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 427, 'last_played': 1591097609}
review: 萌系的画风，有趣的解密和创意满满的boss战.5块钱害图啥呢,冲就完事了

author: {'steamid': '76561198409229565', 'num_games_owned': 138, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 631, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1596707843}
review: 新版本没汉化可以asdw移动，旧版本有汉化移动不了。。。。

author: {'steamid': '76561198859877848', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 554, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 494, 'last_played': 1584007932}
review:
很好玩很好玩很好玩，好玩到停不下来。
可玩程度很高，可以自由探索，地图很大，是走一遍下来时长很很长的游戏。
画风很可爱、人物们的性格都很可爱、设定和故事也很有意思。
玩简单模式操作没有很困难，
虽然汉化没有完全但是凭我小学的英语阅读水平也没啥障碍的。
这次打折超级便宜 但wuppo是即使是原价也很值得玩的游戏！！！
（好像在设置里看到一个two player模式 是联机吗？？还没有试过。）

author: {'steamid': '76561198372305275', 'num_games_owned': 246, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 584, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 467, 'last_played': 1631719806}
review:
쪼꼬미들 나와서 아기자기 하게 싸우는게임이에요.
약간 오픈월드 같은 느낌이 있고, 전투도 되게 간단해요.

길치는 약간 힘들수도 있는게, 약간 머리를 굴려서 가야되는곳도 있더라구요.
그 무엇보다 맘에드는건 얘들이 하나같이 귀엽다는점, 진짜 맘에 들어요..

총도 페인트 총같고.. 진짜 재밌게 해서 저는 추천드려요. 세일하길래 바로 사서 쭉 달렸거든요.
세일 안하면.. 고민 좀 해보셔요.

author: {'steamid': '76561198961784369', 'num_games_owned': 251, 'num_reviews': 164, 'playtime_forever': 386, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1660362841}
review: 很棒的游戏，但是玩过来体验极差，首先是玩原版出现卡顿或者卡死现象，极其不友好（我的配置是完全够玩一款横板2d游戏的）。其次是玩老版就直接出现慢动作ppt现象，感到十分差劲。还有说一下关于汉化的小问题，现在版本的汉化你先切到双人再暂停看一下，单人居然是担任，可以说这汉化不走心。另外就是希望广大有相同问题或者有解决办法的同胞们积极留言，因为真的是很喜欢这款游戏，所以对于这样的游玩体验实在是不应该！希望官方能更新一下解决游戏运行和汉化的问题，十分感谢！

review: We need all Chinese, plz！！
developer_response:
嗨！游戏的中文版更新我们正在激情开发中。目前游戏可以用中文游玩，但是更新的对话会以英文展示。如果你想以纯中文玩游戏，你可以先玩 Wuppo 的旧版本，我们将很快通知你完全支持中文的消息。
怎样游玩 Wuppo 的旧版本：
1. 右键单击游戏库中的「Wuppo」
2. 选择「属性」
3. 单击「beta」
4. 点击下拉菜单并选择 「Classic」
https://steamcommunity.com/games/400630/announcements/detail/1611648239515149433

author: {'steamid': '76561198033961040', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 507, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 507, 'last_played': 1583272695}
review:
One of the happiest gaming experiences for me in a long time, Wuppo obviously has been created with passion and an eye for detail. It's a cute story about a lazy potato, who clearly has yet to learn the meaning of responsibility.
The game has great dialogue, a strong backstory and lots of hidden pieces of lore and secret items, which invite to explore a beautifully designed open world. Wuppo has a level of depth I didn't expect, with a vivid world, that is influenced by your progression through the game.

The story took me around 8 hours to complete on normal while spending reasonable time on secrets.
If I had kids, I would love to play Wuppo in co-op with them, though I'd recommend this game to any age group.

review:
Immediately hooked. Unique piece!
Top delivery for your kids to enjoy!
About 6 hours of content for adult to reach 100% progress. For kids, more.

The game world could be a bit larger or endgame could include some activities. Fnakball tournaments, Jollyboing battles, obstacle races, block shootouts or something more suitable for WUMS to do.
Looking forward to Breft Festival which hopefully fulfills this need.

author: {'steamid': '76561198977674892', 'num_games_owned': 73, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 222, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 62, 'last_played': 1588316781}
review: 不得不说，是一款好游戏。5块打折买的一开始以为是那种比较无聊的小游戏然后各种秀萌什么的，然后我看封面相当友好以及打折就买了。但上手体验的时候才发现物超所值。里面人物的形象不仅可爱，（现在还没玩多久）还看到了致敬马里奥的环节。游戏机制感觉在闯关游戏中加入了一些有趣的元素，比如幻灯片、告示牌。最令人耳目一新的是打boss，目前只打到一条大鱼。大鱼的机制虽然与其他游戏大致相同。但无限弹药的枪配上可以打掉boss群体伤害让人在众多小游戏中体验良好（毕竟玩过的小游戏总是弄出一些奇怪的问题）。然后操作与上手相当简单，并不像吃鸡、cs这些FPS一样难度高。但汉化包体验不良，也许有时候汉化得不完整或是没有汉化，经常冒出来几句关键词带中文的对话（还没有游玩完毕，不知道后面会不会有更多汉化问题），甚至还出来几句全英语未汉化（就比如上文是几个中文，可能答复就全英文了）。当然，游戏开发初期有点问题很正常。最后，如此有意思的题材希望出多人模式联机游玩，相信这样会有更多可玩性。

author: {'steamid': '76561198850815838', 'num_games_owned': 108, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1314, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 121, 'last_played': 1667872942}
review:
遇到了一个bug，在坐过山车的时候，他询问你是否乘坐的时候选择否，并且站在后面，这时候你不会掉下去，而且那个板子也没有关上。这时你可以跳过去白嫖过山车。由于乘客们无法到达那个平台，没有新的乘客乘坐过山车，所以你一旦乘坐就下不来了，只能读档。
I met a bug when I was taking that roller coaster. That guy asked me if I would like to have one ticked. At that time I didn't stand on that plank and chose "No". As a result that plank kept opening and I could still jump over that gap, paying nothing to have fun. Because that plank kept being open, the subsequent passengers(AI) just cannot get  to the upper plane, which means there won't be any new passengers.  So once I do that I will be stuck on the seat, doing nothing but to re-road the profile.

author: {'steamid': '76561198408430212', 'num_games_owned': 523, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 716, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 677, 'last_played': 1609081119}
review:
个人很喜欢的一款休闲游戏，是一个由冰激凌引发的拯救世界的传奇故事【bushi】。
    游戏的画风非常可爱和喜人，在不同环境下的不同音乐也可以给人别样的新鲜感。尽管看上去是一款小品游戏，但如果真的要仔细探索，可能至少花费20+的小时数才可能完成。因为游戏本身的完成度非常非常之高，而且对环境刻画之深刻也令人为之赞叹【比如你如果吃的太胖会被警察抓走】【bushi】
    简而言之，适当难度的战斗环节配合解谜要素，以及一个非常有趣的故事主线和大量不相干，但给游戏增添了极为丰富内容的支线都让这款游戏显得非常有趣【笑】反正游戏也不算太贵，对得起这个价位的游戏。
    大概是这样的。

author: {'steamid': '76561198318794290', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 160, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 9, 'last_played': 1642932044}
review:
在classic edition中，无法控制角色。
在definitive edition中，可正常操作，但汉化不完整。

In classic edition, you can not control the role.
In definitive edition, you can control the role normally，but the Chinese translation is incomplete.
developer_response:
您可以使用WASD键
希望对您有所帮助
有人找到了另一个解决方案：如果在游戏中无法操作，尝试开启输入法的英文大写
--- google translated from ---
You can use the WASD keys
Hope that helps!
Someone found another solution: if it doesn't work in the game, try turning on the English capitalization of the input method.

review:
画风很可爱！！！沾着一身泥到处蹦跶爽到不行（然后被丢下了楼x）明明刚开头还是个完全肥宅！怎么后来就变成小豆丁了啦！地图很大 就是对话实在太多英文看得我头昏脑涨（跪）
ps：按照评论里换成旧版本 全汉化是全汉化了 但是小巫姆就一动不动了 就算直接读取之前的档也是完全一动不动 如同我的心一样一动也不动 汉化和游玩不可兼得吗……！！有点悲伤 但是5r血赚 先放着等个有全汉化的更新。

review:
Good casual game to play casually in your spare time...i like to explore for a bit and come back later on..

Reminds me a bit of FEZ, one of my favourite games, but this is more "social" so to say with funny stories in between, cute graphics but way less style compare to FEZ, still a good game tough.

Bought it on Offer and i don't regret it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198972136456', 'num_games_owned': 95, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 484, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 411, 'last_played': 1591445720}
review:
这次打折，五块钱就能入手，本以为是一次喜加一，没想到玩了10分钟便再不想退出，直接推完了剧情。

我，扮演一只好吃懒做的乌母，只会在自己的小屋里吃冰激凌，还因为洒的到处都是被赶出了乌母之家，无家可归的我捡到了鸟兄，他总是能提醒或保护笨手笨脚的我，我们拿到了前往大城市的车票，我也逐渐成长起来，和水下大怪物成了朋友,还给城市和平；在天坑中结交了仇族好朋友，带着他完成他的梦想；召唤史前神灵，在布莱克兄弟的帮助下打败大脸怪拯救了世界，让所有种族都能和睦的生活在崭新的美好世界......而我也得到了嘉奖，我总算有了属于自己的房子，我又可以在里面无忧无虑地吃冰激凌了。

毕竟是款放松向的游戏，玩到最后也只是鼻子酸了酸，但剧情确实让人感动。过一阵子开高难二周目！

画面十分棒，看着就有治愈感。人物的话除了中后期boss有点一言难尽，都很可爱。

流程方面，前期很简单，中期之后就要靠社区里的大佬们了，因为有支线而且没有地图总览，客厅谜题即便在有社区大佬的详细攻略，我也花了半个小时，后期有频繁的重复跑图，有些枯燥，最后的boss很难打，但总体很ok，一句话，社区大佬们nb！

还等啥呢，5块钱都不买？赶紧买买买！

author: {'steamid': '76561198268915667', 'num_games_owned': 34, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 381, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 125, 'last_played': 1591341418}
review:
这游戏超可爱的！！！猛男必玩哈哈哈
                                                          关于汉化的问题！！！！！！                    请看！！！
据我了解，Wupoo未更新前是有完整的汉化，更新后就中英混杂
根据作者的提示，我们可以先游玩 Wuppo 的旧版本，这样可以体验全汉化：
1. 右键单击游戏库中的「Wuppo」2. 选择「属性」3. 单击「beta」/测试4. 点击下拉菜单并选择 「Classic」
换回旧版本后，打开游戏进入主菜单，再次设置各选项，用鼠标滚轮滚到下方调整键位（很重要），就可以畅玩了

Ps：跪求新版本完全汉化！！！游戏是好游戏~

author: {'steamid': '76561198825280473', 'num_games_owned': 245, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 1184, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 667, 'last_played': 1669127007}
review:
Wuppo超级可爱！！
[u]  如果在游戏中出现相应问题，建议进行以下操作，仅供参考： [/u]
1.[u] 如果想要游玩完整的汉化版[/u]，在属性-测试里应用classic调成旧版本，并在游戏内将语言调成中文（随游戏更新，本条已作废）
2.如果感到游戏卡顿或字体加载太慢，在设置中把平滑度调到最低，关闭垂直同步
3.如果在游戏中无法操作，尝试开启输入法的英文[u]大写[/u]
然后就可以畅玩游戏啦！！下面开始评测：
Wuppo本身是平台游戏，但是游戏中有丰富的剧情，也有解谜要素，有战斗系统，Wuppo完全可以满足不同类型玩家的需求。
[h1] 优点 [/h1]
+难度：可以自行选择难度
+画面：虽然游戏背景看上去像是“画图”软件画出来的，但是放到游戏里就是十分美丽！而且与游戏的主题和氛围十分契合。
+剧情：讲述的故事可以说是一个童话吧，也是挺暖心的故事。游戏中的许多事件看似毫无关联，但是串起来就变成了一个十分有趣的长篇童话。游戏有完整的世界观，给人一种恢宏大气的感觉。有完整的排队系统，在玩游戏的时候不会感觉游戏里只有你一个生物。最后的结局也很暖心，不会让人有草草收尾的感觉。
+音乐：让人自然而然地融入游戏世界
+附加内容：买游戏就送长达3小时的原声音轨，一本PDF，一个资料片，4K高清壁纸，还有商店DLC
+耐玩性：不看攻略的话，一周目通关一般要在5个小时以上（我用了9小时），地图很大，给人探索不完的感觉。通关解锁的隐藏挑战有点硬核，成就感觉可以肝好久。

[h1] 缺点 [/h1]
-部分解谜：游戏中有两个地方容易卡关，看似毫无关联的事件会无法让人把它们联想到一起。后期还有较麻烦的谜题。
-跑图累：中后期的地图初见时会感觉非常大，让人不知道要做什么。
[h1] 。 [/h1]
这应该是我在Steam上玩过的最冷门（评测数最少）的游戏了。但是它绝对是不可多得的独立精品，值得一玩。
真的没想到折扣力度会这么大。折扣价已经是超值了。

8.8/10
最后，祝开发商越做越好！

review: Игра с приятным, мультяшным дизайном, медитативным геймплеем и забавной, по-детски наивной историей. Игра не может похвастаться обилием механик, но те, что есть, сделаны вполне качественно. Явно видно, что авторы подходили к проекту со всей душой. Игра отлично подойдёт и взрослым, и детям, ведь все мы иногда хотим поиграть во что-нибудь не напряжное и смешное.

author: {'steamid': '76561198274028964', 'num_games_owned': 213, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 721, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 721, 'last_played': 1583155298}
review:
12h全通关（竟然只达成了4个成就？

游戏很可爱，剧情也很温暖，一切故事都要从一个冰淇淋说起。其中带一点解谜性质，我对解谜类游戏不太擅长，基本就是靠瞎撞，Daedalic出的那一堆解谜游戏已经在库里吃灰了。所以玩wuppo的时候也有点卡关，特别是后面神庙解谜部分。

后期加了汉化（部分对话仍旧有bug），BOSS关也有修改，难度降低很多。

[spoiler]拯救了世界，却看不到世界和平后是什么样子，弗纳克还在自己的领地，看到wum还是会恶意攻击，全知们也仍四散在各地，BOSS也还在反面世界等着Wum去挑战。大部分游戏都是这样，做一个英雄真孤独啊，胜利只有自己能看到。[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198294009909', 'num_games_owned': 88, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 4083, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3056, 'last_played': 1661558588}
review:
Um dos jogos que eu mais amo, o mundo é mais vivo que qualquer jogo que já joguei e é construído de maneira ótima conforme você progride nele. A história no inicio parece ser simples mas acaba ganhando bastante complexidade perto do fim do jogo, todos os diálogos foram ótimos de se acompanhar principalmente pelo jeito que são apresentados. É muito fofo, você tem toda a liberdade que você quiser e eu não sei por que mas eu amo andar no popotrain mesmo que seja por motivo nenhum. A música se adapta a maioria das situações, criando uma atmosfera muito envolvente e imersiva que é ótimo para só entrar nesse mundo e aproveitar. Eu amo o sistema de felicidade, que te recompensa por fazer algumas coisinhas bobas, que sozinhas o buff e muito pequeno mas somando faz bastante diferenca. O jogo tem conteúdo para você explorar por muito tempo e alguns puzzles não tão complicados divertidos de resolver, que pra mim sao as melhores partes. O único ponto ruim é que "acaba", mesmo você ainda podendo fazer o que quiser. 

Basicamente eu amo muito, vai comprar vale a pena.

author: {'steamid': '76561197974644369', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 138, 'playtime_forever': 841, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 801, 'last_played': 1626010413}
review:
슈팅, 어드벤쳐, rpg 등이 짬뽕된 게임.

액션으로 보면 플레이시간 자체는 적절한 것 같지만 그 중에 액션이 차지하는 비중이 적음. rpg로 보면 플레이시간이 많이 부족한 느낌.

그래도 곳곳에 신경 쓴 부분이 많고 이야기를 재미있게 풀어가는 것이 좋아보임.
스토리 자체는 그렇게 흥미롭지 않지만 귀여운 디자인, 코믹한 진행이 보상해 줌.
특히 잔잔하면서 분위기를 망치지 않는 bgm이 좋았음.

액션 쪽은 단순하지만 비중이 높지 않아서 평가할만한 부분이 많지 않고 보스는 다양하게 있지만 역시 단순함. 난이도를 올리면 모르겠지만.. 그래도 보스 디자인이 좋고 피통이 너무 많거나 데미지가 너무 많이 들어가는 등의 짜증나는 요소는 전혀 없어서 게임의 맥이 끊어지는 부분은 없음.

즐길 거리가 많지는 않지만 하는 동안은 즐거움을 느낄 수 있는 게임이라고 정리할 수 있을듯

author: {'steamid': '76561198261035580', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 43, 'playtime_forever': 1329, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1329, 'last_played': 1576560824}
review: So this actually ended up being on of my more favorite games I've played in a long time. The game itself is not all that large, but the way it was developed around knowing the limitations is what is most impressive. There is an almost open world feel to the map, with multiple currencies, items, choices, and places to go for various reasons (some are not even necessary for game completion). The way there was so much extra dialogue and so many extra choices (that ultimately still lead to the same conclusion but just offered a different path to get there) were nice. Those really made the game feel much bigger than it actually was. The story was good as well. It concluded a bit weak in my opinion at the very end, almost like the developers wanted to wrap things up quickly, but that is such a small part of it that it didn't really do any harm, just a little sad. The "Overwhelmingly Positive" amount of reviews this title has is 100% earned here for sure.

author: {'steamid': '76561198345802590', 'num_games_owned': 139, 'num_reviews': 47, 'playtime_forever': 238, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 238, 'last_played': 1581004287}
review:
不同当前时代的画风
虽然是简笔 但是处处充满可爱的小细节 让人看的非常舒服
可爱的动作可爱的对话 可爱这两个字都快从屏幕溢出来了
但是！！但是 我实在是忍受不了一些设定了
1.为什么对话结束的最后一句我也要有动作？ 那个地方是不能移动的 无数次我认为我还在对话中 这个时候别的操作是无效的但是特么的可以继续对话！！ 我真的是和一个人说话想退出来都要用心注意 不小心就反复说好几次
2.任务指引。我没有看到哪里有清晰的任务列表或者指引之类的东西。当然我不是说一键寻路或者直接标点之类的脑残设定，但很多时候我真的不明白我应该做什么。
3.页面标注的远程同乐和双人本地我没找到开启的方法和位置。使用测试版开启中文后就play two选项也消失了。
4.手柄是不能改键位么？有人说可以但是我没有找到位置，手柄摇杆瞄准的同时射击真的奇怪到爆。电机枪电池打没电或者把狮子人打死之类的事情。
5.友军ai问题很大，底下打石头的时候 我跑去踩他狮子人跟着我跑？？？ 而且噩梦难度一jio就死了

不过闲暇时间打开wuppo 净化一下自己的心灵还是很棒的【当然别跟我一样烦躁起来

author: {'steamid': '76561198128171383', 'num_games_owned': 239, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 316, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 203, 'last_played': 1580900982}
review:
看着画风萌就买了，有时间就拿出来玩玩。

剧情属于那种无厘头但是线性剧情，需要推动剧情发展。游戏里很细致，有天气系统和日夜时间系统，天黑的时候乌姆们都会回到自己房间睡觉，白天和黑夜发生的事件也不同。

有点类似pikuniku，但是做的剧情还挺长，而且游戏系统很丰富。有一点缺点就是任务引导有点不清楚，经常玩着玩着就不知道自己要去干嘛了，不过你去探索世界也是可以的剧情限制不多

author: {'steamid': '76561198798314974', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 4060, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2905, 'last_played': 1588591553}
review:
今年发现的最喜欢的游戏！！可惜没能早点玩到的那种
探索性强，有平台跳跃、解密和战斗元素，难度适中，各种小细节和音乐完全是我的加分项
印象最深的果然还是开发者如何把这个小世界塑造得有自己独特的规则又那么真实，比如排队模拟器（？），打工送报纸和傻乎乎的城市议会议题，形形色色但是都很可爱的的NPC
另外对话写得实在是太良心了，对话中的选支可以疯狂延伸下去哈哈哈，即使很多人可能不会那样选择他们也很认真地写了对话，塞进各种有趣的东西，比如最开头的前台Carlo打电话剧情[spoiler]如果你每个选项都选择了更挑衅的对话，直到在楼下约战，你真的会被Carlo冲出来打一下哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈还会扣血哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈然后他因为觉得很抱歉所以给你冰淇淋，我太喜欢这段了！！[/spoiler] 整个游戏里都散布着这样的小乐趣，我通关好几次了还在反复坐火车和排队坐设施快乐
[b]总之是100%推荐！[/b] 买了不吃亏不上当而且这个游戏还老是打折？？？即使48原价也很值！
唯一的缺点就是现在的翻译和对话经常卡的bug，相信是可以改进的
[b]总之快去买Wuppo！！！！！[/b]

author: {'steamid': '76561198348950233', 'num_games_owned': 226, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 987, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 987, 'last_played': 1535371591}
review: Much like its player character, Wuppo is small, charming, round, and puts you in a peaceful state of mind when you immerse your face in it. Featuring a light-hearted story, simple combat, and a colourful, cartoony world that manages to be immersive due in part to its lack of music and a day-night cycle that operates in real time, complete with scheduled elements that behave on that cycle.

author: {'steamid': '76561198860017573', 'num_games_owned': 145, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1187, 'last_played': 1688795666}
review:
让我感到非常幸福可爱的游戏。
突然想玩点简单轻松向的，将近20个小时一直都很快乐。每增加一点主角的幸福度我自己也会超级开心。
最喜欢的就是戴着咖啡帽子到处乱逛。

author: {'steamid': '76561198285202831', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1394, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1394, 'last_played': 1578141033}
review: 游戏总剧情其实很简单，这里就不剧透了，喜欢的玩家可以慢慢探索。画风非常可爱，尤其wuppo本身就像一颗球一样，但是放大看会发现，这东西原来有脚的啊！游戏里面细节满满，细节党一本满足，大家可以自己找找看。唯一让人不爽的就是这个汉化，不知道是不兼容还是游戏本身的问题，这个汉化时有时无，而且最后的名单全都是乱码。我刚刚查了一下，这是16年的游戏了，如果汉化还做成这个样子真的难受。如果要打分的话，满分十分游戏本身可以给8.5分，汉化扣1分，最后就是7.5分，总体还是推荐的。--truffles--

author: {'steamid': '76561198383484809', 'num_games_owned': 143, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 1957, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1012, 'last_played': 1656931495}
review:
[h1] 一段奇妙的圆滚滚冒险 [/h1]

     [b] 如果你想在工作或者学习之余放松一下，亦或是在游玩其他战斗激烈的游戏后想转变一下画风，那么《Wuppo》绝对是你的最佳选择。 [/b]

     在《Wuppo》中，你一开始要扮演一只好吃懒做，无所事事的巫姆，你在旅店中搞砸了一些事情，也因此被驱逐出旅馆。在你被迫思考从何去处的同时，一段奇妙的冒险也因此开始了。

     在冒险途中，你会慢慢探索这个奇妙的世界，结识新朋友、了解整个世界观、认识好几种不同的萌萌种族、并考究过往的历史。通过许多事件后，你的任务目标也会从“找到一个新家”变为更加远大的目标。

     [h1] 极其丰富的NPC系统 [/h1]

     如果说这个游戏和其他休闲游戏相比，有什么不一样的地方的的话，那么就当属该游戏丰富的NPC系统了。

     [u] 在《Wuppo》中，你甚至会有自己在玩“大型多人在线联机游戏”的错觉。 [/u]该游戏有着一套完整的天气和时间系统，比如在一开始的旅店中，每个NPC都会根据一天中时间的变化去做不同的事情，在游乐园中，你会看到人山人海的场景，许多NPC会自己去买东西，如果你想游玩一个项目，你甚至需要去排队，如果你恶意插队，那么其他人会一起把你挤出队伍外。如果你想去远的地方，你也要按部就班的去等火车，每一班火车都会有许多人乘坐。[spoiler] 为什么在游戏里我还要去排队和等地铁啊 [/spoiler]

     在后来的城市中，你也会看到匆匆忙忙的人们四处奔波工作，你可以租旅馆、去咖啡馆、在工厂里上班、送报纸、去钓鱼、或者接受一些危险的委托来赚钱，也要和其他人一起等电车，如果等的不耐烦的话，你也可以不坐电车自己跑过去，和等电车的耗时其实是差不多一样的。[spoiler] 当心被车撞 [/spoiler]

     [h1] 欢快的战斗系统和彩蛋 [/h1]

     在游戏中，你能遇见的小怪杂鱼很少，大部分的战斗环节都是由BOSS战组成，在游戏中有着大大小小的BOSS战约几十场，作为一个休闲游戏，它的整体战斗难度并不高，普通难度下整个游戏玩下来几乎不会死几次。此外游戏中还有丰富的彩蛋系统，有着很多隐藏道具、地点、BOSS、成就等着你去发掘。

    整个游戏流程约为12个小时，在打折后《Wuppo》也仅仅只售19元，并且会免费送3个DLC，在我看来这个价钱简直买到就是赚到。唯一美中不足的地方是游戏中虽然自带官方简体中文，但是[u] 整个游戏汉化度大约只有90%左右 [u]，依旧有一小部分文本没有翻译，但大多数都是一些其他的对话，几乎不会影响到正常游玩，因此还是非常推荐入手的。

[spoiler] 主角太萌了，awsl，还有弗纳克球真好玩 [/spoiler]

review: terrible controller support, buggy (got stuck several times not being able to move, had to restart)
developer_response:
Sorry to hear that. Could you elaborate on where / how you got stuck? We've heard a few reports of people not being able to progress the dialogue, but they managed to fix it by changing some settings. https://steamcommunity.com/app/400630/discussions/0/1697221160900656229/

As for controller support, we think the default settings provide the best gameplay, even if they take some time to get used to. You're welcome to remap your buttons through the settings though.

author: {'steamid': '76561198400240216', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 283, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 61, 'last_played': 1584188121}
review: 我就搞不懂为什么游戏里的中文没了，以前还有
developer_response:
嗨。游戏的中文版更新我们正在激情开发中。目前游戏可以用中文游玩，但是更新的对话会以英文展示。如果你想以纯中文玩游戏，你可以先玩 Wuppo 的旧版本，我们将很快通知你完全支持中文的消息。
怎样游玩 Wuppo 的旧版本：
1. 右键单击游戏库中的「Wuppo」
2. 选择「属性」
3. 单击「beta」
4. 点击下拉菜单并选择 「Classic」

author: {'steamid': '76561198425153156', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 931, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 731, 'last_played': 1640219877}
review:
This game is a true hidden gem. Emphasis on "hidden" because even though it's got "overwhelmingly positive" reviews, I see and hear almost no one talk about. I stumbled upon it by complete accident while browsing metroidvania games. People say that this is is "two man passion project", and seeing the amount of work and creativity that was put into this game, I can totally get behind that.

The gameplay is actually pretty simple. You control a little marshmellow spider guy called a "Wum" and you basically platform around, solve puzzles, and occasionally fight stuff. Like most metroidvanias, exploration is very rewarding, with lots of secrets, items, and little bonuses stuffed into every nook and cranny. But unlike most metroidvanias, backtracking won't be something you'll find yourself doing a whole lot. As the story progresses, you'll be traveling from location to location, constantly moving forward. You do get new abilities in the form of new items to let you progress, but while they can sometimes help you explore areas that were previously blocked off, it's by no means a requirement. It's mainly again for advancing the story and moving forward. I don't see this as a bad thing, in fact, considering that fast travel is only available SUPER late in the game, it was a smart decision to encourage exploration without making a requirement. As for the controls, they feel smooth and responsive, just the way I like it. It may take you a bit to get used to the control scheme, but that's hardly a complaint. This game is pretty easy overall, the main challenge comes from the bosses and figuring out what to do. I occasionally found myself overthinking a puzzle during my playthrough, only to realize the very simple and honestly somewhat obvious solution. The game can have those "What am I supposed to do now?" moments, but try not to overthink them, as hints on what to do are plentiful and will point in the right direction. The bosses on the other hand are hard because of their hard to dodge attack patterns. There aren't many moments where the boss will present itself to be hit, meaning you have to blast away at them while simultaneously dodging their attacks. Almost like a bullet hell when you think about it. But like the core gameplay, they're simple, and it's not too hard to figure out what attacks do what before you get it down. You may get your little wum butt kicked again and again, but it's all about memorizing what they do and finding an ideal time to open fire. And if you want some more challenging battles, there's a boss rush available after beating the game.

But gameplay aside, the REAL hero here is the presentation. This game literally feels like a child's art piece come to life. The way everything is drawn with this adorable childish style just oozes with charm. Everything about this game is super adorable, from the silly looking characters, to the cartoonish sound effects, I mean you literally shoot CANDY as your primary attack. Everything feels like the imagination of a 5 year-old, and to my surprise, it works, and I love it. The story matches that tone to a T. Basically, a bunch of creatures called Fnakkers wanted to rule the world, but together with the Blussers and Splenkhakkers, the clever Wums pushed them into a sinkhole. You play as a Wum who got kicked out of a hotel for spilling ice cream and now you need a new home. It's simple and charming, but I was really surprised by the how the actually expanded upon these ideas further. There's actually some legitimately interesting depth and lore to this game, and that surprised me! But don't worry folks, there's no super dark twist or edgy villains or anything, the game maintains that quirky whimsical charm the whole the through, it even gets straight bizarre too! I adore the presentation, and I feel like it alone makes it worth your time.

Now normally, this is where I'd put my complaints about this game, but I'm in a weird spot. See, when I played, my main issue was how you can only hold one item at a time, having to flip through a menu everytime you wanted to switch, but since then, the devs have actually added a quick select to fix that problem. So yeah, no complaints here!

Overall 10/10 game, I love it to pieces. I'd love to see a sequel of some sort, or at the very least, see more from these two devs

author: {'steamid': '76561198368099358', 'num_games_owned': 749, 'num_reviews': 187, 'playtime_forever': 340, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 340, 'last_played': 1576462349}
review:
[h1] Wuppo - Definitive Edition [/h1] 

[b] A Charming, Funny, Above Average Adventure Game [/b]

[b] Wuppo - Definitive Edition [/b] is a unique, colorful, and cute little game. It has many mechanics within it, ranging from light RPG systems to a surprisingly detailed world, and even includes a decent amount of fighting and some platforming. I personally got a little tired of it, but it doesn't mean that the title was bad by any means.

The game is very open in terms of its story, while there are generally objectives to complete within this title, you are able to travel around the semi-open world and complete various activities and meet different creatures. I found the lack of direction sometimes to be frustrating, since it would only say to "find x item" or "complete y objective", but I assume it is because some goals can be accomplished in different ways. This freedom is nice for an indie game that I assumed would be a basic platformer, but it is pretty rich in content. 

The world is definitely larger than I expected in this title, with an entire city to explore, an well-sized apartment complex, and multiple types of areas ranging from a jungle, to an underground tunnel, to a chain of islands. There are a LOT of items in this game, and most seem cosmetic, but the options are there for those who want to grind out money to try different outfits/items out. I thought the opening section was fun, with a good platforming sequence and a couple of cool boss battles, but the middle stretch of the game is where I got bored personally. I didn't like the fact that multiple odd jobs would have to be completed in order to progress the story, and it dragged the gameplay to a screeching halt. This was disappointing because I felt the game had a cool style to it, but it runs into the issue of trying to do too much without fleshing any one thing out.

[b] Wuppo - Definitive Edition [/b] was an interesting game to try out. While I didn't get a chance to fully complete it, I found it to be an interesting experience nonetheless. The game has a boatload of systems, yet doesn't flesh out any one particular aspect out very well. If it cut a few areas and streamlined the objectives needed to be completed, I feel I would have enjoyed it more than I did, but to each there own. I will still [b] Recommend [/b] this game, as it provides enough diversity and uniqueness to its gameplay, despite it not hitting the right notes for me. Give this title a try, and you might end up finding your own personal hidden gem!

[h2] Final Verdict: 6/10 (Above Average) [/h2]

If you enjoyed this review, feel free to check out my curator page for my thoughts on a variety of other games!

https://store.steampowered.com/curator/37542043-ADHD-Reviews/

review: Mimo oryginalnej, lekko cukierkowej grafiki, zachęcającego opisu i przytłaczających opinii na Steamie, ewidentnie coś nie kliknęło pomiędzy mną a "Wuppo". Najbardziej zniechęca mnie koszmarne sterowanie na padzie - przyciski poprzypisywane są zupełnie nieintuicyjnie, a nawet po ich zmianie nie jest lepiej. Historia też jakoś szczególnie mnie nie wciągnęła i po prostu czuję się zniechęcona do dalszego grania. Pewnie dalej jest lepiej, ale przynajmniej na razie odpuszczę sobie ten tytuł.

author: {'steamid': '76561198087863255', 'num_games_owned': 200, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 1801, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1801, 'last_played': 1574837210}
review:
I went into this expecting a short and cute game that would last me a few hours at most. I got much more than I bargained for.
The world in Wuppo never feels empty and feels lived-in, and you can tell a lot of love was put into every detail in the game. 
One thing I particularly liked was the happiness mechanic that raised your maximum health. It's incredibly heartwarming to see the little unexpected things that can make you and others happier. I love it.

Also you play as a little blob with legs what more can you ask for

author: {'steamid': '76561198010679705', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 756, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 756, 'last_played': 1574470350}
review:
A whimsical, wholesome and upbeat adventure about the adventures of a lowly Wum as he searches for a new home while meeting and making friends along the way.  From its unique graphics and upbeat soundtrack, you can tell this was a labor of love.  It's like watching a Saturday morning cartoon.  That's a huge compliment to the developers.

The gameplay is very much Metroidvania but with an emphasis on puzzle solving over combat.  Local drop-in/out cooperative mode is included for some of those pesky boss fights that can be a tiny bit harder than they should be.  Puzzles can also be a little vague on how to complete them.  Do yourself a favor: use a walkthrough occasionally and enjoy the ride.

review: Amazingly intricate world, with just beautiful dynamics and lovingly built scenes. You can easily tell how much love creators put in this game. It looked like it was going to be a much simpler game, but I'm in awe at how much there is to do and discover, at all of the history and lore created, and the many, many mechanics that are at play! I am really enjoying this game with its laid back main character and the silly, cute and funny way he advances in this adventure.

author: {'steamid': '76561197993148381', 'num_games_owned': 4366, 'num_reviews': 189, 'playtime_forever': 670, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 670, 'last_played': 1572320258}
review: A wonderfully charming game, [i]Wuppo[/i] is a 2D platform/adventure ('Metroidvania', perhaps?) game set in a world inhabited by a number of Kirby-like 'blob' creatures; in particular the game follows an exiled 'wum' in the search for a new home. As the game progresses, it does a great job of laying out its strange world, with an impressive amount of background lore to discover and the initially slightly 'amateur'-feeling low-res graphics come to feel very fitting, helping to heighten the world's strangeness. There's a enjoyable variety in the tasks that you'll need to take on to progress, from the mainstay of twin-stick shooting combat through to distributing newspapers and fishing - the game does a lot with quite a limited set of tools. To raise just one niggle, if you want to seek out 100% completion/collection after beating the main game, this can get a bit tedious in one respect, as you'll need to earn a decent chunk of money for a few things and these's no particularly quick and easy way of doing so. Besides this, though, there's a nice in-game clue system to help you towards full completion, which helps to balance out the potential 'grindy' element.

author: {'steamid': '76561198213951093', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 598, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 598, 'last_played': 1571971626}
review:
Very fun and very cute game that reminds me of a lot of childhood favourites. Story-wise, I'd say it's pretty similar to a Paper Mario game, with a unique world, fun dialogue, and interesting and silly NPCs. I enjoyed slowly learning about this weird little world with its weird little inhabitants; there's lots to look around at and explore, and tons of tidbits of information lying around (mainly in the form of "filmstrips", a collectable you'll find in various places that contain a mini slideshow of sorts)

Gameplay-wise, it's pretty simplistic and kind of makes me think of those old web browser flash games. Very simple controls and combat, you run, jump, and fire your weapon (which has optional upgrades and variations), and little much else besides using items to advance the story or solve small puzzles. Personally, I'm okay with this. I enjoy simple games like this every now and then, especially ones that are just charming and fun for the sake of being fun. The only thing I'm a little disappointed with are the bosses, which are waaay to easy and can all be easily beaten by continuously firing at them and bringing a good supply of healing items.

Overall, I really enjoyed this little game! I definitely recommend it to anyone who's into what I described above, but I don't think it'd be very enjoyable for any hardcore gamer that dislikes simplicity. Of course, it's not very expensive so I still recommend giving it a shot anyway! the worst possible outcome is that you spend some time looking around this cute, charming little world and decide it isn't for you

author: {'steamid': '76561198950614738', 'num_games_owned': 50, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 240, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 195, 'last_played': 1597928739}

author: {'steamid': '76561198241466040', 'num_games_owned': 397, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 322, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 156, 'last_played': 1588121613}
review:
Wuppo é um jogo estranhamente surpreendente. Conta com uma trilha sonora incrível e que ajuda a ambientar muito bem a gameplay. Os gráficos e plot do jogo são extremamente simplistas, porém isso cria um estilo único para a obra, que usa de suas mecânicas minimalistas para criar um ambiente fofo e agradável e reuni-lo a uma jogatina fluida.
A história principal do jogo segue o caminho do nosso personagem, uma bolinha branca com algumas patinhas, característicos de sua espécie, os Wums. Os Wums são uma das quatro espécies que existem no mundo fictício do jogo, essa informação pode ser relativamente não importante para a história do jogo, mas esse ê um dos seus maiores charmes. 
O fato do jogo oferecer a possibilidade de exploração livre pelo mapa e conversar com diversos NPCs, que contam diversos detalhes sobre a backstory do game. Isso possibilita ao jogador a experienciação da lore do jogo, extremamente extensa e bem trabalhada, sendo interligadas de maneira muito complexa.
Não é tão comum que jogos indies e produções tão pequenas, se comparadas com franquias multimilionárias, possuam um universo tão complexo ao seu redor, e isso apenas realça os anos de trabalho árduo que foram depositados nesse game.
Sobre a linha da narrativa do jogo em si, o objetivo do personagem é encontrar uma nova casa após ser expulso de sua antiga residência por sujar o chão de sorvete. Um história simples, mas que o guia em direção a uma jornada árdua, mas também com uma pegada muito leve, já que diversos cenários são mais costumeiros e calmos, reforçando a atmosfera inicial do jogo
Apesar de poder não parecer grande coisa, Wuppo é uma experiência muito confortável e pode te carregar pelos cenários de modo que você esqueça do seu objetivo inicial, e do fato de que os puzzles te levarão a batalhar com algum boss, tudo isso em busca de sua nova morada.

10/10 brabo dms

author: {'steamid': '76561198253466291', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 828, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 828, 'last_played': 1539613929}
review:
한산하고 귀엽고 알차게 게임 할 수 있었습니다. 심심풀이로 가볍게 갔다가 만족의 식사를 하고 나오는 기분.

author: {'steamid': '76561198347044261', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 959, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 560, 'last_played': 1594479930}
review: I love this game. But I can't move forward because of a game error. The producers have to help me. The sixth lever is empty underground in the sinkhole. I can't understand why there isn't a sixth lever. :(
developer_response: The 6th lever has been removed to make the puzzle easier. You should already be able to reach the bottom, even though walkthroughs will tell you to look for a 6th one. Good luck!

author: {'steamid': '76561198199694514', 'num_games_owned': 190, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 893, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 684, 'last_played': 1689917471}
review:
Es un juego divertido...
Me lo pase de inicio a fin y me mataron muchas veces....
Creo que soy bastante terrible en este juego.

Bueno el juego tiene graficos infantiles pero DSDAKDMA ami me encanta el estilo, si bien la historia
no es nada complejo del otro mundo llego un momento en que hablaron de la vida y la existencia y pense
que me habia inyectado algo en las uñas de los dedos de los pies porque me hizo pensar.

Me gusto mucho el gameplay, es bastante dinamico y divertido a mi parecer...
La sountrack SEÑORES este juego tiene una sountrack genial, ami me encanta, sobretodo la cancion que se escucha en la primera zona por la noche, me parece una cancion bellisima.


Creo que solo tengo 3 problemas con el juego:
Es algo corto, y siento que pudo haber sido mucho mas grande, si no que quiza enorme... Espero que le saquen una secuela o un sucesor espiritual mas extenso pero igual de bueno o mejor.

Aveces no sabia que hacer, eso ya es personal xd

La ultima parte del juego la senti un poco apresurada, no dire mas para no spoilear.

Algo que tambien siento que le falta a este juego son mas tipos de armas, pues solo se usa ese cañon de gomitas o lo que sea.... Si tambien existe un arma que sirve para lanzar agua, pero es practicamente lo mismo..

Tambien podrian haber puesto algo extra como otros personajes o algo asi....


Pero de lejos este juego es muy bueno, divertido y me dejo feliz.
Aunque no lo complete al 100% hay muchas cosas que hacer dentro del juego.

Yo le doy un 7.7 de 11

Divertido, dinamico y muy bonito, aunque como dije, ALMENOS A MI PARECER, carece de contenido y pudo haber sido mas ambicioso...
Un juego sencillo pero con un buen reto que inclusive puede agradar a los mas pequeños de la casa (Y a los grandes)
Recordemos que los niños de ahora a los 4 años ya saben usar una una AK 47 mejor que un soldado de elite, juegos como Wuppo apesar de todo pueden ser divertidos y lindos para que los pequeños se diviertan y empiezen en el mundo del gaming.

Escuche que ya salio la definitive edition, le dare un chequeo despues, pues yo me termine el juego antes de esta actualizacion...

Compren el juego vatos, los desarrolladores necesitan dinero y se lo merecen

author: {'steamid': '76561198863286216', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 673, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 277, 'last_played': 1570640926}
review:
游戏本身制作非常好，可以说是我一定一定会推荐给朋友的游戏了。
但最近的更新里面的标题更换的中文字体太丑了！太丑了！太丑了！太丑了！太丑了！太丑了！太丑了！！！！还有巫泡是什么鬼翻译！干脆用英文标题不好吗？！！！
不用手绘字体的话就请干脆不用中文，请不要用丑爆了的印刷体污染视线好吗？？！！！这种字体跟游戏本身的感觉根本一点都不符合！
这种感觉就像是一颗老鼠屎毁了一锅品质极好的粥，令人倒尽胃口……
求求你们赶紧换字体吧！求求你们赶紧换字体吧！求求你们赶紧换字体吧！
最后，因为对wuppo本身的喜爱我还是推荐游戏，但是我请求换字体或干脆用原本的英文字体！不然我真的没法正视这款游戏！
ps：想玩旧版本(强烈推荐)的朋友可以选择：库——wuppo——右键单击属性——beta——Classic
以上，最后再重申一遍：求求你们赶紧换字体吧！

author: {'steamid': '76561198089096439', 'num_games_owned': 226, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1538, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1482, 'last_played': 1687635798}
review:
I received this game for free for participating in the beta testing (thank you <3). I got featured twice in the credits by accident with two different names (the one I had when they gave me the key and the one I had when I was beta testing!) :))))). I won't say the names since I'm keeping that as some sort of personal achievement!

Anyways... Now with my opinion:

Really cute game. Feels kinda short if you rush it. It's a game you need to sit down and enjoy every detail as most of the effort was put into those side-stuff. The Popo City part was my favorite part of the game for sure. This game kinda has a Paper Mario vive with its environment and characters which I really love btw. The soundtrack was very nice too, I'm still listening to some of the OST to this day. Looking forward to what the developers release next.

review: I really wanted to like this game. and maybe its my own fault for not taking the "platformer" description seriously enough.  I got stuck about 10 -20 minutes in - unable to double jump off a bouncy mushroom over a spiked root. Like really stuck - tried for 30 minutes, looked it up online thinking I must be missing something, but no I  just suck at double jumping.  So if  platformers are your thing - then this  might be  great game - just not so much if your jumping skills are limited like me.

author: {'steamid': '76561198003019731', 'num_games_owned': 1879, 'num_reviews': 368, 'playtime_forever': 506, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 506, 'last_played': 1568868267}
review:
Vendo por alto, você não dá nada por Wuppo, mesmo em sua Edição Definitiva. Vamos ser francos: olhe esses gráficos, aparentemente criados no Paint por uma criança do primário que come giz de cera.

Porém, aqueles que ousarem transpor suas concepções iniciais, serão contemplados com um charmoso jogo que transcende diversos gêneros, esconde uma grande complexidade e cativa com um mundo inesperado. Se ele pelo menos soubesse para onde está indo...

[h1]Joe the Circle, é Você?[/h1]

Nos primórdios da internet lá em casa, do tempo da conexão discada e do guaraná de rolha, descobri as webcomics através de [url=http://joethecircle.com/comic/?cat=7]Joe the Circle[/url]. Provavelmente cheguei ali através de uma revista de internet porque naquela era primitiva era assim que você encontrava coisas interessantes: lendo em um artefato físico feito de polpa de árvore prensada. Tempos estranhos.

Joe the Circle tinha provavelmente os piores traços da história dos quadrinhos, era algo que dava a volta e virava naif. Entretanto, esse não era o ponto. O ponto era que aquilo era divertido pra cacete. Mike Shapiro, o seu criador, não se deixou intimidar por sua patente deficiência ilustrativa e foi à luta, produzindo uma ampla coleção de histórias sobre um personagem que era, essencialmente, uma bola segurando uma arma de raios, que se metia em confusões estapafúrdias pela galáxia. Apesar de sua simplicidade (ou por conta de sua ingênua simplicidade), Joe the Circle funcionava.

Esse é um longo preâmbulo para explicar que Wuppo é, pelo menos para mim, Joe the Circle em forma de jogo. Não que seu protagonista tenha a mesma propensão a causar mais problemas do que resolver, não pelo nível de violência, mas pela plasticidade dos traços simples e pelo fato de esconder um texto charmoso e um universo muito mais complexo do que parecia em um primeiro olhar.

Wuppo ou, como foi batizado, Skallywag, é uma bola com perninhas que segura coisas na cabeça. Seu mundo é formado por outros seres como ele, os Wums, mas também por outras criaturas igualmente toscas, mas não menos cativantes. Apesar das claras limitações, ainda assim o personagem central é expressivo. Ele é preguiçoso, pouco motivado, dado a respostas mal-educadas aqui e ali e caras e bocas de desagrado. Não é o Link que esse mundo mágico precisa, mas é o que tem para hoje.

O protagonista concebido pela Knuist & Perzik não é um exemplo para nada, mas é o sujeito que vai, involuntariamente, indo, indo, indo, e, quando o jogador se dá conta, ele salvou o mundo, resolvendo uma treta ancestral. Entretanto, ele começa o jogo sendo expulso de casa mesmo, um grande condomínio para Wums. Por derramar sorvete no chão (!), nosso bravo herói precisa procurar uma nova casa e explorar esse mundão.

[h1]Cara, Cadê Minha Motivação?[/h1]

Essa premissa absurda é um dos principais defeitos do jogo. As coisas vão simplesmente acontecendo no caminho de Skallywag e ele apenas tenta entender o que é necessário fazer para outras coisas acontecerem e a "história" avançar. Ele não tem um objetivo muito claro ou mesmo um desejo íntimo, ele apenas segue a cartilha de Zeca Pagodinho e deixa a vida levá-lo. Nesse sentido, Wuppo é um jogo realmente sobre as amizades que fazemos pelo caminho.

Essa falta de direção está clara até mesmo em suas mecânicas. O Knuist & Perzik mistura aqui elementos de plataforma, puzzle, adventure e RPG com mundo aberto, deixando o jogador solto com muitas, mas muitas possibilidades de interação. Nada é efetivamente explicado e é possível gastar um tempo grande em missões paralelas que não impactam a trama, sem nunca descobrir qual é exatamente o gatilho que libera o próximo passo da jornada.

Não que eu estivesse esperando uma grande seta laranja no céu indicando meu objetivo ou um mini-mapa decente com um X vermelho. Entretanto, Wuppo corre solto demais em sua dinâmica de simplesmente deixar o protagonista conhecer o mundo. OK, eu entendi que é um universo bacana, com um lore mais profundo que muito RPG convencional e NPCs divertidos, para não dizer bizarros. Porém, é comum rodar em círculos em busca do que fazer.

As mecânicas do jogo podem ludibriar também. Passei dois dias acreditando que o pulo duplo tinha bugado, incapaz de acessar áreas fundamentais em minha exploração. Uma busca na internet revelou que o personagem estava, na verdade, gordo, logo, não podia pular como antigamente. A solução para emagrecer também não era das mais óbvias e cheguei a esbarrar em algumas análises profissionais que acusam o jogo de ser "inconsistente" com seu sistema de pulos.

Com um mapa colossal, Wuppo vai exigir em outros pontos que o jogador retorne várias vezes para determinados lugares ou dê voltas complicadas para solucionar enigmas. Nem pense em cair do trem em Popo City: você terá que fazer uma boa caminhada. Em contrapartida, se você apenas usar o trem em Popo City, você não vai conseguir avançar a história.

Para um título leve que deseja mostrar seu mundo maravilhoso para o jogador, Wuppo peca por dinâmicas enfadonhas e aquela lógica absurda dos adventures mais sádicos.

Além disso, o jogo é salpicado de batalhas contra chefes (quase vinte no total), algumas bastante frustrantes, outras muito fáceis. O combate em Wuppo é tão simples quanto seus traços, sem espaço para evoluções significativas ou estratégias. Basicamente, acerte mais do que seja acertado e você vai vencer. Porém, haverá confrontos em que você irá xingar os controles, o chefe, os desenvolvedores, até conseguir traçar um perfil do padrão de ataque do inimigo.

[h1]Dê Uma Chance à Paz![/h1]

E por que eu estou fazendo isso tudo mesmo? Se a história carece de um fio condutor, pelo menos a jornada transborda simpatia e simpatia é quase amor. Em poucos minutos, aprendi a amar aqueles personagens mal-traçados e seus cenários, sua fala engraçada, seus problemas e sua sociedade. Até mesmo o papagaio, que me chama de Skallywag o tempo todo, é algo com que aprendi a conviver.

Esse clima de fofura reverbera na trilha sonora, um misto de desenho animado com algo fora da curva, que se encaixa direitinho com a proposta de Wuppo. Esse é um mundo que parece infantil, mas é bem esquisito e a música faz parte do pacote.

Ser expulso do lar não é o mais nobre dos inícios, mas é o que tirou nosso protagonista de sua zona de conforto. Sem querer, querendo, ele vai desbravar esse mundo, realizar missões sem sentido, realizar missões com sentido e, pasme!, levar a paz a todos. Essa vontade de fazer o bem, de criar amigos está explícita até na forma como o herói evolui: ele ganha pontos de vida sendo simpático, trazendo harmonia onde há caos, conforto onde há dúvida. Tirando a arma na cabeça e a postura distraída, ele é quase um São Francisco esférico.Não, definitivamente, esse cara não é Joe the Circle. E o mundo de Wuppo: Definitive Edition vale a visita. Quem sabe, de repente, você vai ficando, ficando, e, quando se dá conta, fechou o jogo.

Publicado originalmente em: [url=https://www.gamerview.com.br/reviews/wuppo-definitive-edition]https://www.gamerview.com.br/reviews/wuppo-definitive-edition[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198130404598', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 845, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 838, 'last_played': 1568297680}
review: 手绘可爱风的横板冒险类游戏。游戏整体氛围轻松休闲，玩完以后感觉整个人都快被萌化了。游戏内容除boss战外，主要为解谜和跑酷。在其中收集要素也是一大亮点，收集各个地区的幻灯片作为有效的反映世界观的方式值得称道。整体游戏一周目时长在10h以上，各boss战多死几次也就过去了。不足之处：游戏指引欠佳，无论是场景互动还是任务指引解谜上，容易卡关。

author: {'steamid': '76561198217944679', 'num_games_owned': 49, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1401, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1381, 'last_played': 1579344423}
review:
一款画风十分可爱的游戏，讲述一个小汤圆巫姆因为太喜欢冰激凌而被赶出巫姆之家随后拯救世界的故事
游戏刚经过大型更新（好像900多M更新内容），许多贴图、光照、效果都重置了，一些BOSS也进行了修改
（似乎出现了许多BUG，中英文也还有些冲突，官方在更新中说会在后续修正，想完好体验需要玩旧版，请耐心等待吧，从大更重置和DLC免费这2点来看，制作组对这款游戏还是很在意的）
（只打了旧版一周目，新版没有太多时间去玩，只是粗略的玩了几下，看了BOSS连战，原本的DLC变为免费了）
游戏中有四个种族，可爱小汤圆Wum，崇拜石头的花狮人（游戏中似乎没把这个种族算进去，所以是四个种族），喜欢骗钱的斯波兰克，为了食物而痴迷的弗纳克，失踪人口回归的布拉克
1.画风可爱，小汤圆拯救世界嗷
2.音乐还是不错的，并且更新后许多音乐也被重置了
3.BOSS战，拥有各种不同特色的BOSS，没有像一般的游戏堆血量数据来提高难度，更新后很多招式变更，最终BOSS完全重置，一些BOSS明显比旧版难度更高了
4.休闲游戏，有超真实的排队系统[spoiler] 你要等车，和NPC排队	[/spoiler]，钓鱼能钓出一堆奇怪的东西，没事可以去波波城打打工或者去弗纳克那边欺负菜鸟球手[spoiler] 相当于支线小游戏	[/spoiler]
5.有一定量的收集度（当然我不是收集玩家_(:зゝ∠)_）
6.对话文本量很多，制作组也十分用心，感觉可以和NPC聊很久[spoiler] 听别人说在悬崖那边一直跳下去，鹦鹉老哥和你对话了一分钟多的文本都不是重复的，后来太累没继续看对话（不知道是不是真的）	[/spoiler]
7.还有很多让人喜欢的NPC，追求知识的鹦鹉，全知翁三人组，布拉瑞斯和观测站老哥，在弗纳克中被排挤的小弗纳克，巫姆之家外表严肃实则善良的接待员等[spoiler] 弗纳克大厨真的是鬼才...不说了，我佛了	[/spoiler]
8.和之前的评测说的一样，麻雀虽小，五脏俱全，似乎没有什么明显的缺点与不足（但是新版重置后有很多BUG和冲突，还是耐心等待下官方修正吧[spoiler] PS：这游戏的翻译都是真人翻译的，真不是机翻啊	[/spoiler]
分割线—————————————————————————————————————
总之是一个很欢乐休闲的游戏，结交许多善良的朋友，一个小汤圆拯救世界的美好故事
[spoiler] 第一次这么认真写评测，有很多疏漏和需要补充的，轻喷	[/spoiler]

author: {'steamid': '76561198088838825', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 208, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 198, 'last_played': 1578651283}
review:
为什么中文下面夹了很多英文？原来都没有这样的情况。请尽快修复。
鉴于开发者积极的处理和回复，更改评价为推荐。

游戏是非常有趣的游戏。这点毋庸置疑。

期待尽快修复中文显示错误。
developer_response:
嗨！我们目前仍在积极完善游戏的中文版本。请耐心等待。

目前游戏可以用中文游玩，但是更新的对话会以英文展示。如果你想以纯中文玩游戏，你可以先玩 Wuppo 的旧版本，我们将很快通知你完全支持中文的消息。
怎样游玩 Wuppo 的旧版本：
1. 右键单击游戏库中的「Wuppo」
2. 选择「属性」
3. 单击「beta」
4. 点击下拉菜单并选择 「Classic」

author: {'steamid': '76561198179671330', 'num_games_owned': 110, 'num_reviews': 76, 'playtime_forever': 1913, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 996, 'last_played': 1691054477}
review: wum好像卡比一样可爱，食物引发惨案

author: {'steamid': '76561198188384226', 'num_games_owned': 657, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 4302, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3057, 'last_played': 1611761603}
review:
不知道这个游戏后续更新是怎么样的了，完整汉化请选择[Classic]模式。
这个游戏从暑假开始玩的，两次通关之后决定录制视频攻略……结果9月8号再次打开游戏之后，游戏版本从1.1.104退化到1.0.5，这还不是主要问题，主要问题是游戏内容也被修改！1.1.104是完美汉化版的，而1.0.5是部分汉化的版本，几乎所有的物品解释都是中英文混杂，而且背景也变得混乱不堪，由原来的手写体英文变成了印刷体中文！简单看了一下更新的记录，2019年9月5号更新为最终版，但是最终版是这种样子的吗？？最终版就应该毫无诚意地进行版本倒退吗？原本的完美汉化没有了，取而代之的非常像一个初始版本，游戏第3次通关还未达成，不清楚删减了什么内容，但是这次更新造成的版本倒退让我非常反感。版本被更改了之后，还私自更改了我的键位设定，到处都不伦不类的，这个游戏是好是坏我已经不在意了，但是这样毫无底线的操作，让我感觉很恶心，对不起，我给差评！更新前后有视频对比，地址[spoiler]https://www.bilibili.com/video/av66943196[/spoiler]
游戏是好游戏，不然不会玩两遍，但是私自修改了内容，让我感觉我的知情权受到了影响，关键是游戏并没有向更好更完美的方向更新，而是发生了倒退，我买游戏是为了开心不是为了烦恼，这个游戏，不推荐
developer_response:
嗨！我们目前仍在积极完善游戏的中文版本。请耐心等待。

目前游戏可以用中文游玩，但是更新的对话会以英文展示。如果你想以纯中文玩游戏，你可以先玩 Wuppo 的旧版本，我们将很快通知你完全支持中文的消息。
怎样游玩 Wuppo 的旧版本：
1. 右键单击游戏库中的「Wuppo」
2. 选择「属性」
3. 单击「beta」
4. 点击下拉菜单并选择 「Classic」

author: {'steamid': '76561198168036551', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 584, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 272, 'last_played': 1644027351}
review:
This game is undeniably charming, cute, and full of things to do. Its an adventure reminiscent of Paper Mario: 1000YD in which you journey back and forth across various landscapes acquiring items to wear, fight with, eat and just plain old goof off with. You fight bosses, complete tasks for other Wums, and solve some mild platform/puzzles

This is a game for people wanting to have a cute and easy-going time.

author: {'steamid': '76561198295375316', 'num_games_owned': 257, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 1842, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1842, 'last_played': 1530675581}
review:
제발 후속작을 내줘...너무 갓겜이야... 

아기자기한 그림에 충실하고 뚜렷한 스토리라인.
수집하는 요소에 상호작용하는 맛까지..
미니게임에 보스전까지 모두 완벽합니다 모험요소도 갓갓임 
비밀길 찾는 맛에 무기수집까지 진짜 모두 완벽해요. 

제발 후속작내줘 내 돈을 가져가란 말이야

한가지 단점은 길찾기가 처음에는 막 헷갈림
근데 스토리따라가면 차차 알게됩니다. 
가벼운 스토리인줄 알았으나 철학적 질문까지 담긴 갓 스토리. 꼭 사세요 두번즐기세요

author: {'steamid': '76561198342021299', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 2728, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2507, 'last_played': 1640847843}

author: {'steamid': '76561198258639325', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1160, 'last_played': 1569091316}
review:
Wuppo es un juego muy estúpido, cuando lo vi por primera vez me encantó, cuando lo terminé me dejo con esa sensación de haber encontrado una joya indie.

Eres una bola con patas muy torpe, vives viendo TV y comiendo helado, un día cuando pides helado a la recepción lo derramas todo y te corren del lugar, así empieza Wuppo ¡Qué podría salir mal! La historia es super simple y tan mala que es buena, lo digo en serio. El tono de la narrativa es cómica y sin sentido, muy entretenida de descubrir. El aspecto visual en lo personal me encanta y junto con la banda sonora hacen del ambiente uno muy agradable.
Las mecánicas de gameplay son básicamente un side-scroller con disparos de pintura y gravedad, plataformeo, exploración y bosses con conceptos muy originales, mi recomendación es jugar en difícil ya que es la dificultad perfecta para que no sea extremadamente sencillo o no disfrutable.

Edit: Lo actualizaron y corrigieron muchisimos detalles como controles personalizables (que no había) batallas lentas y tediosas las mejoraron considerablemente, la batalla final ahora se siente mil veces mas intensa que antes (cambiaron patrones de ataque) e incluso agregaron multijugaron (supuestamente)

Realmente lo recomiendo, no es para todos y tiene una duración relativamente corta pero indies como estos lo valen por su originalidad.

review:
之前白嫖的免费wuppo，我还在想这个游戏怎么这么良心！低配福利，剧情长，战斗有趣，支线多，场景多！后来发现这是个暂时免费游戏emmm现在一看，48！好便宜！可惜我是白嫖的【躺
真的太可爱了，导致刚白嫖的那几天一直在刷刷刷，打完之后不过瘾，进boss战那里继续打……
希望可以再多出一些支线！比如说专门搞个跑商，把钓鱼线操作上，然后可以买几个特别的帽子，改身体颜色图案啥的
更希望出联机！！来一场沙雕之间的加农炮大战qwq

review:
人物太可爱（或者说是球物），非常迫不及待的打完了，流程不算特别差，解密也刚刚好点到即止非常容易理解，我这种手癌也能好好的过关，虽然本来可以靠努力而变强但是我偏偏在boss关拼血，希望大家不要学我，要好好的变强。
收集要素也非常有意思，细节也很多，不知道什么时候我可以进密道。
非常想要挑战危险的操作，不过跑图很累，希望能有快捷通道。

author: {'steamid': '76561198073117949', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 1413, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1413, 'last_played': 1506031075}
review:
Truthfully, I'm downright awful at platformers and usually avoid them like the plague. This game looked adorable though, so I decided to give it a go anyway. 

The platforming sections are forgivingly easy and most of the challenge lies in the combat and puzzles. The devs managed to create an extremely charming, zany little world with some of the most memorable metroidvania sections I've ever had the pleasure of playing through. It reminded me in a way of some of the fantasy books usually targeted at kids who have just started reading -- simple but full of imagination and creativity, with a complimentary art style. :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197984338378', 'num_games_owned': 829, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 423, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 423, 'last_played': 1563065891}
review:
It looked ok on the Steam page, almost like the devs took a few leaves out of the Paper Mario playbook for 64 and The Thousand Year Door for world and sound design. It wasn't a great experience.

The game kind of moves in real time and sometimes without you, so you'll do actual boring stuff like waiting for a train for minutes because [i]that's what happens in real life[/i]. I found myself wandering kind of aimlessly and not attached to anything in the world, which sounds like exactly what the devs wanted the player to feel like because the game is finding a new place for the player character to live and belong, but in practice it was just boring. I didn't care about actually doing anything after wandering around the levels I did play.

It was a cheap pick, so I don't feel really burned. Ended up being a typical indie game with lots of style but little substance to keep me engaged.

author: {'steamid': '76561198333327139', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 1622, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1308, 'last_played': 1625401487}
review:
80퍼 할인 받아서 3200원에 샀고, 아이스크림이나 흘리고 다닌다며 혼나는 백수가 비자발적으로 세상을 구하는 게임입니다.
 그림체가 거지같다고 무시했다가 언더테일만한 감동까진 아니지만 훈훈함에 크리티컬맞아서 시즌2가 나왔으면 좋겠다고 생각할 만큼 충만감을 갖게 하네요. 맵이 거지같고 길찾기 힘들다고 할 땐 언제고 끝이 나면 다 외우고 있는 스스로를 발견하게 될 겁니다. 중간중간 공략찾아보면서 해보세요. 예쁜 여캐가 메인인 가챠 RPG 자동사냥 게임할 바에 이거 한 번 하는 게 휠씬 나을거에요. 깔끔하게 끝내서 시즌2가 나오진 않을 것 같지만 생긴다면 하고 싶습니다. 그리고 한글화 갓글화입니다. 사투리도 찰져요.. 아이 찰져..

author: {'steamid': '76561198083535553', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 748, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 699, 'last_played': 1571284932}
review:
So I don't right many reviews on steam or in general, but This game was so good I just have to.

First of all this game reaches charm levels that shouldn't even be possible. Everything about this game gives me the same kind of joy I experienced playing Paper Mario The Thousand Year door. Through and Through this game feels like a classic Nintendo masterpiece. Which is great. It blows my mind that this game was made by two people. The art, the characters, the writing, literally everything about this game is great. It's fun and challenging without ever feeling too frustrating. If you enjoy 100 percenting games this one is very fun to 100 percent. There is so many secrets to find and places to explore. Anyway I could talk about this game forever, and I'm terrible at writing reviews so I'm going to wrap this up. Long story short buy this game and play it. Like Half-Life this is a game I feel everyone should experience even if you don't beat it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198093356013', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 594, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1587350892}
review:
Wuppo is one of those games where you see the Overwhelmingly Positive track record, and it makes you scratch your head as to why you've never heard of it, or what could be so enthralling in a game about a little puffball who wears a bunch of hats that give him different abilities and this is starting to sound like a Kirby game the further I go with this. Yes, Kirby is one of my favorite characters ever, mind your own business.

I picked it up on sale along with a handful of other cheap games that piqued my interest, and Wuppo stands out as one of the most charming games I've played.

Wuppo is like if a game developer was challenged to create a full game using a Game Jam prompt, and the staff consisted of 13 year-old Timmy from next door on Art Direction, that one class-clown theater kid from high school English Lit as the writing staff, and the two college students in charge of coding and music that somehow keep it all in line.

And it works fantastically.

In spite of only being about two hours deep - apparently that's about a fifth of the game's entire playtime (non-100%) - the game swept me up in its passively sarcastic tone and straightforward plot. It's childish simplicity done right, where instead of feeling juvenile, it feels lighthearted and silly. It's tongue-in-cheek in an aggressively playful way that practically forces you to un-bunch your grumpy-pants and lighten up, whether you want to or not. Exploring the world is satisfying thanks to the tight controls that allow for fun platforming while offering some light puzzle-solving. The whole thing has a very "flash game" feel to it, but reaps the benefits of a talented team that built it with dedication and care, working by the mantra "don't take it too seriously." Hard/Insane mode adds a fun layer of challenge for those looking to get a bit more bang for their buck and really test themselves.

If you're in the market for a charming, casual Metroidvania title that you can beat in a weekend, you can't do much better than Wuppo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198121162968', 'num_games_owned': 322, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 3079, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3033, 'last_played': 1652517290}
review:
Jetzt, wo es das Spiel auch auf Deutsch gibt, habt ihr keine Ausrede mehr es nicht zu spielen :]

Wuppo ist einer meiner favoriten Titel auf Steam, und ich kann dieses Spiel jedem nur wärmstens empfehlen.
Neben Breath of the Wild und anderen ist auch Wuppo einer der Titel, die ich gerne neu erleben wollen würde, ohne die Welt bereits zu kennen. Dieses Spiel ist mehr eine Erfahrung als ein Spiel - die Welt und deren Bewohner kennen lernen, etwas über die Geschichte herausfinden oder sich kurz entspannen, ehe man die Welt als kleiner Wum retten muss.

Dieses Spiel ist ein Dialog-orientierter, charmevoller Plattformer, bei dem man sich auch häufig gegen die eher unfreundlich gesinnten Einwohner von Wuppo verteidigen muss. Springt wild umher, löst verschiedene Probleme entweder durch Kommunizierung oder mit ein paar Schüssen der Gummikanone und erforscht währenddessen die Welt von Wuppo.

Alle Interessierten können ja auch die Demo austesten oder den Beginn des Spiels im Internet anschauen, es gibt gewiss genug Leute, die das Spiel aufgenommen haben. Es würde mich freuen, wenn dieses Spiel etwas mehr Anerkennung erhalten würde, da es diese reichlich verdient hat.

Vielen Dank für's Lesen! Ich hoffe, ich konnte etwas zu eurer Entscheidung beitragen :)

review:
這個遊戲無論是對話或打boss都很有趣
可以選擇難度這點，對於動作遊戲不熟悉的人非常親切
一開始以為是簡單的小遊戲，但遊戲的內容卻意外的充實
非常推薦在跑主線前去到處逛逛，有許多有趣的支線任務跟小遊戲

但是有點要注意，如果一開始畫面解析度設定太大遊戲畫面會整個卡在銀幕的某一邊
而且有機會變的滑鼠按不到重新設定解析度的按鈕，如果發生這種狀況刪掉遊戲重裝也沒用
但是按f5或f6就可以調整回來了((找了很久的方法，希望對也遇難(x)的人有幫助

author: {'steamid': '76561198062754251', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 284, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 284, 'last_played': 1547344588}
review:
[h1]All For Wum, Wum For All[/h1]

[b]Wuppo = Knytt + Mr. Saturn + Ice Cream[/b]

This is definitely one of the most charming games you're going to stumble across, but don't let the low-fi pastel graphics fool you.  Wuppo has enough under the hood to scratch your platformer/exploration itch.

This game really brings to mind oldskool indie platformer classics like Knytt or Seiklus.  In fact, if you like either of those titles, it's probably a given that you'lve love Wuppo.  It helps that the game has the great advantage of also NOT feeling like a platformer in the sense that it feels more like a fully-realized world that you incidentally platform your way through.

It also has light Metroidvania and RPG aspects, as you definitely need to have certain items to proceed through certain areas, and there can be frequent backtracking to previously inaccessible areas.  You also have a weapon that you can improve and modify, which adds a little bit of that RPG grind feel to your progress.

Boss fights can sometimes be challenging, and there are a number of puzzles, but the real way in which Wuppo shines is simply observing/taking part in the living world that all these adorable little critters live in.  It is somewhat reminiscent of Mr. Saturn from Earthbound, not only in how the Wums look, but also how zany their society operates.

[i]Become Wum of Many if...[/i]

[list]
[*] You want an interactive, exploration-focused experience in a convincing world.
[*] You want a platformer that's a little more laid back and off the beaten path.
[*] You are looking for a game that is as cute as it is clever.
[/list]

[i]You're not the Wum if...[/i]

[list]
[*] You are looking for a very mechanics-focused platformer.
[*] You need hardcore difficulty.
[*] You need lots of action and combat.
[/list]

[u]The Bottom Line[/u]

Wuppo is an overlooked titan of exploration-platformers.  Unlike other, similar indie platformers, Wuppo goes the extra mile in terms of making you feel like a true, weird little world is happening all around you, and it also helps that there is plenty of clever writing and dialogue that is every bit as charming as the visual presentation.

If you have the patience for a somewhat leisurely-paced, exploration-focused metroidvania-lite experience, you really would be missing the train (it has that too!) by not giving Wuppo a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035560545', 'num_games_owned': 3970, 'num_reviews': 224, 'playtime_forever': 479, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 479, 'last_played': 1535176202}
review:
[h1] Probably as cute as it sounds	[/h1]

Somewhere between marshmallow and dust bunny, is a wum, one of the three or so races found in this quaint world. After being kicked out of his residence we get to follow him on his journey of jumping, shooting gumballs, making friends, and finding happiness. It may come off as saccharin on paper, but is implemented quite well. Throughout the game your HP (happiness points ) can be increased by doing things like riding a roller coaster, helping people , making friends, learning something new, etc. It’s a neat mechanic and does a great job showing heroes growth. There are many optional things to do just for the sake of doing them: the aforementioned rollercoaster costs many you have to earn on your own time, and then you have to queue up like any other citizen, the game will not let you on the ride if you cut in line. It’s a neat way to tie the narrative’s idea of character growth through the mechanics.

 What began as a selfish wum who was so consumed by TV he consumed it, ends with a wum exploring relationships and maturing. One of the notable fights includes a boss’s confused and sad reactions that reminded me of Earthbound. It’s a running theme that a lot of the beings in the game, enemy or not, are just misunderstood.  Such as a pet whose owner didn't teach him better. The racism and prejudice in Wuppos’ world is treated in a light hearted manner, but it’s still a major schism in the game. 

It’s not too long but there are plenty of secrets and sidequests. It’s a rich world with lots of lore. What could be silly world with little context is actually fleshed out quite well, mostly through collectible film reels, or through talking with characters. The epilogue ties everything up nicely- and a sequel would be more than welcome. 

The whimsical style and bright colors hold a rich heart warming game.

*** update, they have made the game even better with a number of changes including co-op. Buy it now.

All of it ultimately makes it feel a it more real, not because there's a giant face that asks you for mud in exchange for a wish, but because the characters react and interact with the environment in a way that feels natural.

review: Just simply amazing. Fell in love with this game and couldn't put it down until I finished it. Sound and art style are amazing.

author: {'steamid': '76561197978551915', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 638, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 638, 'last_played': 1517190153}
review:
What an unusual game and interesting game. Wuppo is part platform adventure game, part point n' click adventure style game, and twin stick shooter. It's comes across as a cute and whimsical game, but it's rather text heavy, where the world feels very much alive as you explore and learn about it, supplemented with quite a bit of combat despite it's simplistic nature where there are difficult parts.

It's actually way more fun than it sounds and it's very much worth playing something quite unique like this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198217921067', 'num_games_owned': 323, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 909, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 880, 'last_played': 1590966227}
review: It's a great game for the price, sometimes the gameplay is a little tedious, such as walking around the map, as well as fighting some of the bosses, and grinding for gold. There's a lot of depth in this game, with the collectables and secrets, and the pricing of the game makes it well worth the experience.

author: {'steamid': '76561198866435464', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 1756, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1242, 'last_played': 1673285400}
review: 我超惨。吃土少女过了春节降价才在b站看到谜叔的录播入了游戏的坑。不过感觉太好玩了还是立刻原价买下来。本来有一丢丢肉痛，但是游戏不管是画风情节还是音乐都太可爱，而且篇幅超长。虽然我可能智障吧我一直在弗兰克地下卡关，于是乎它在我这里光荣地成为了一个钓鱼游戏。但我还是只想把它吹上天并做一只为它疯狂打call的尖叫鸡。虽然wuppo夏日折扣简直低到我觉得这行为迷惑，不过正好请大家都给我买，然后让开发商多赚点钱继续出这么好玩的游戏哈哈哈哈！！

author: {'steamid': '76561198118382249', 'num_games_owned': 156, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 881, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 881, 'last_played': 1561640738}
review:
*플랫폼 슈팅?게임

- 귀여운 그래픽, 디자인과 분위기에 잘 어울리는 편한 OST가 장점.
- 보스전 좀 짜증나는 부분도 있기는 하지만 전반적으로 재밌음.
- 좀 헤매다 보면 해결되는 적당한 난이도. 길찾기 생각보다 어렵지 않음.
- 볼륨 꽤 크고 세세한 요소가 많음. (=그만큼 도전과제가 귀찮음)
- 하찮고 귀여운 대화와 진지한 스토리 간의 균형을 맞추려고 했으나, 얼렁뚱땅 전개돼서 이도저도 아니게 된 느낌. 
- 막보 디자인을 왜 그렇게 했는진 모르겠지만 어쨌든 트레일러 분위기가 마음에 든다면 플레이하는 걸 추천.

author: {'steamid': '76561198341127330', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 1607, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1010, 'last_played': 1584275143}

author: {'steamid': '76561198207532796', 'num_games_owned': 140, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 2712, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1999, 'last_played': 1639122228}
review:
[u]Histoire[/u]: Fun et bien réalisée, on se fait pas chier.
[u]Gameplay[/u]: Facile à manier, les menus et les contrôles sont intuitifs, mais pourtant les combats étaient intéressant mais pas trop fun, j'ai l'impression que la plus part des attaques c'étaient obligatoires de se les prendre. Mise à part ça, les énigmes sont qualitatives.
[u]Graphismes[/u]: Très charmants.
[u]Musique[/u]: L'OST rend très bien avec l'atmosphère du jeu.

[u]Verdict[/u]: Plutôt tiguidou comme jeu-vidéal ma foi.

author: {'steamid': '76561198353577338', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1144, 'last_played': 1552247208}
review:
超级喜欢这款游戏！2018年的最爱！！强烈推荐！！！我给这个游戏投了好多票
非常可爱的画风，难易适中，完全没有什么浪费时间的情节
我特别喜欢在游乐场派对玩摩天轮跳楼机，感觉做的特别真实😂
真的太萌了，音乐也很可爱(●'◡'●)
安利给大家！吃我安利！

author: {'steamid': '76561198157201361', 'num_games_owned': 889, 'num_reviews': 795, 'playtime_forever': 471, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 471, 'last_played': 1561000344}
review:
I'm not going to recommend this game because I purchased this game because of its overwhelming positive score and after beating it I would rate it a 5.5/10 which doesn't deserve a overwhelmingly postive score

The good
-Music was decent or good
-Storyline (whatever wasn't pure gibberish) was cohesive and fit together well
-Happy Characters
-Game was made with heart
-Although the graphics were extremely simple they stayed consistant
-The game ran really well and the only glitch I encountered was getting stuck in the ground once 
-The game had a good ending

the Bad
-The game has so much worthless things to do with such little depth like a large lake that is super shallow
-It got really tiring reading the dumb names of things
-lots of waiting for trains
- I looked at a walkthrough so I wouldn't have to try and keep figuring out the wonky solutions to things that are never explained how they are supposed to be figured out 
-I was happy for the game to finally be over

author: {'steamid': '76561198050412953', 'num_games_owned': 2081, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 2588, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 881, 'last_played': 1584038089}
review:
This game is a bit like Paper Mario and Undertale. 
Charming characters, cute artstyle and great music. 
But it's also one of those games where the less you know coming in the better it becomes I think. 
Since you're completly in for a world of suprises. 
Let me tell you, the world of Wuppo is amazing and incredibly immersive. 

The basic premise of the game is that you have to find a home and along the way you get to learn more about the deep lore of the world and it's inhabitants. 
There is a lot of creative freedom for the player on how they solve the mysteries going forward.

I strongly recommend this game to everyone, Wuppo deserves to be one of the well know indie games people fondly look towards. 
Up there with the big giants like Undertale, Stardew Valley and Shovel Knight.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119447878', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 202, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 141, 'last_played': 1567790388}

author: {'steamid': '76561198067231466', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 1097, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 885, 'last_played': 1570676292}
review:
At its core, Wuppo is a charming game about exploring a strange world. It has a very unique MSPaint-like cutesy art-style. Most of all - it has character. Neither the story nor its heroes feel copy-pasted from the checklist of video game clichés, as it is often the case. Even names sound like they come from an original exotic language that is meant to twist your tongue in funny ways. It all starts with a lazy icecream-loving creature called Wum being thrown out of its house for being messy and one thing leads to another in organic fashion. I haven't finished the game yet but the dreaded save-the-world cliché has yet to rear it's ugly head. Instead we follow our Wum on a journey of self-discovery and exploration, full of humour and wit. And while it all sounds very childish on paper, and indeed what I've seen of the game has all been very kid-friendly, the story is sprinkled with light socio-political metaphors that add a deeper layer underneath the surface, and the design of the world is so creative that it never stops filling you with wonder.

As far as the gameplay goes it's a metroidvania where you point your mouse where you want to shoot (I don't play with controllers). However, it has more emphasis on exploration, dialogue and even inventory use, like an adventure game, so it's really a mix of genres. It does have its share of fun and bizarre bosses that can take a few tries if you crank up the difficulty like I did. 

Which brings me to two negative points I have: the difficulty setting seems to be tied to game speed. So if you play at lower difficulties your game will get unbearably slow. It should have been kept as a separate setting in my opinion. Also, the game displays a comic-book style effect each time you or something else gets hit - these can obscure the area so much that it gets hard to see where what is, especially if you add a lot of similar looking characters. Sometimes it's also unclear what can be jumped on and what is just background, a problem haunting many platformers.

None of these problems sour the experience too much as the game has a strong core and most of all, it has soul. Unique, quirky, interesting - it embodies everything I love about indie games. #loveindies
